markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Addlebrain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=504)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Inhaled" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=96" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 71</row>

**Price** 58 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Certain Scarlet Triad poisoners use toxins like addlebrain to keep captured prisoners docile and compliant for short periods of time until they can be properly shackled and imprisoned. Addlebrain is distilled from a hallucinogenic lichen that can often be found growing in the sewers below particularly large cities like Katapesh.

 Once soaked in special reagents and then dried, a dose of addlebrain must be either lit with flame or tossed into a fire to activate, whereupon it unleashes a cloud of toxin as normal for an inhaled poison.

 **Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 1 day; **Stage 1** [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) 1 and [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) 1 (10 minutes); **Stage 2** enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 (1 hour); **Stage 3** [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), enfeebled 4, and stupefied 4 (1 day)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Addlebrain
